channel.title: Sparks|Washoe County|Nevada|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Sparks|Washoe County|Nevada|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 21
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 21 - Greg St./Vista Blvd. This is the first exit in the Reno/Sparks area westbound. The Sierra Nevada are visible in the background of the photo.

item.title: I-80 East Exit 21
item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 21 - Vista Blvd./Greg St

item.description: I-80 east approaching Exits 18 and 19. Exit 18 - NV-445/Pyramid Way and Exit 19 - East McCarran Blvd.

item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 18 - NV-445/Pyramid Way

item.title: I-80 East Exit 17
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 17 - Rock Blvd./Nugget Ave. The Nugget Casino is in the background.

item.title: I-80 East Exit 16
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 16 - Victorian Ave./E. 4th St.

item.title: I-80 West Exits 17 and 16
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exits 17 and 16. Exit 17 - Rock Blvd., and Exit 18 - Victorian Way/East 4th St.

item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 18. Exit 18 - NV-445/Pyramid Way.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 17
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 17 - Rock Blvd./Nugget Ave.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 15
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 15 - I-580/US-395/Carson City/Susanville (California). Continue on I-80 west for Sacramento (California).

item.title: I-80 West - Exits 16 and 15
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 16 - Prater Way/E. 4th St. Approaching Exit 15 - I-580/US-395/Carson City/Susanville (California). Continue west on I-80 towards Sacramento (California).

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 16
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 16 - Prater Way/East 4th St.

item.title: I-80 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker for next three Sparks/Reno area exits on I-80 west. Distance to Prater Way, US-395/I-580, Wells Ave.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 17
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 17 - Rock Blvd.

item.title: I-80 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker for next three Sparks/Reno exits on I-80 west: Rock Blvd., Prater Way, and US-395/I-580.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 18
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 18 - NV-445/Pyramid Way.

item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 18 - NV-445/Pyramid Way.

item.title: I-80 West - Reno Travel Times
item.description: Electronic sign that lists Reno/Sparks area travel times. The sign currently is not displaying times. The sign lists times to US-395, Plumb Lane (via US-395) and Virginia St.
